      Photo
      Photos from the Convocation Ceremony
      October 2, 2014 by Daily Nexus Photography

      Incoming students of UCSB received a warm welcome from their Chancellor, Henry T. Yang, and UC Regent and UCSB alum George Kieffer on Monday.

      Photo Credits: Kenneth Song

      UCSB faculty waltz into Convocation on the Faculty Lawn by the lagoon.

      The a cappella group Naked Voices sing the National Anthem before Convocation.

      Chancellor Henry T. Yang welcomes the incoming freshmen of the Class of 2018.

      George Marshall (in the yellow robe) and Ali Guthy (center right) will new occupations within UCSB: Marshall will serve as the new executive vice chancellor, while Guthy begins her stint as President of Associated Students.

      Storke Tower looms in the background while students listen to the Convocation speeches.

      Two attendees sneak in a conversation.

      An airplane drags a Greek life advertisement above the attendees.

      Regent and UCSB alum George Kieffer was the highlight of Convocation.

      Outgoing executive vice chancellor Michael Young, center, sits idly during George Kieffer’s speech.

      Print
      Daily Nexus Photography

      A cool team of photographers who preserves the visual memory of UCSB and Isla Vista.

      The photo editor can be reached at photo@dailynexus.com.

          The Signs as Summer Desserts


          • Aries
            March 21 - April 19
            Yerba mate chocolate truffles
          • Taurus
            April 20 - May 20
            triple chocolate cake
          • Gemini
            May 21 - June 20
            Fireball pumpkin pie
          • Cancer
            June 21 - July 22
            Bucket of ice water
          • Leo
            July 23 - August 22
            S'mores
          • Virgo
            August 23 - September 22
            Vodka mocha bundt cake
          • Libra
            September 23 - October 22
            Chocolate-covered almonds
          • Scorpio
            October 23 - November 21
            Frozen yogurt with Hot Cheeto topping
          • Sagittarius
            November 22 - December 21
            Jar of mayonnaise
          • Capricorn
            December 22 - January 19

          • Aquarius
